alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Koochiching and northwestern St. Louis Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kabetogama, or 18 miles east of International Falls, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kabetogama Lake around 725 PM CDT. Voyageurs National Park around 730 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sand Point Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
